text: Bhutan has only two universities that is RUBhttp://www.rub.edu.bt/index.php/en/ Bhutan and KGUMSBhttps://www.kgumsb.edu.bt/ Bhutan. *Royal University of Bhutan **There are nine constituent colleges and two affiliated colleges under RUB *Khesar Gyalpo University of Medical Sciences of Bhutanhttps://www.kgumsb.edu.bt/ (KGUMSB). * Tango University of Buddhist Studies. * Jigme Singye Wangchuck School of Law ==References== Universities Bhutan List Bhutan
title: List of universities in Bhutan
